name: Driving Strikers: Online Demo
description:
Driving Strikers is an upcoming online multiplayer game for the SEGA Dreamcast, Windows, Linux, and Raspberry Pi. Play fast-paced soccer matches with cars! Boost to score!

The first indie online multiplayer game for the Dreamcast! Built using the Simulant engine.

Works with dial-up modem or broadband adapter (although broadband hosts have a better experience).
